attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: its time for us to stand up and start traning our young pepole in the traids that are needed in this our british ilse as we have a lot of kids out of work and importing the skill1s from abrode does not sort it out ore start the natinal service for 16-25 year olds who dont want to work and just wont to stay on benefits give brition back some pride in our self`s and i mean all kids from all comuates no mater therr coller ore religen

rejection.details: Please give an explicit action for HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
